articles.title: Teachers, Researchers Move into Flats in Mirae Scientists Street
articles.content:
Teachers, Researchers Move into Flats in Mirae Scientists Street
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- There took place a ceremony of awarding the certificates to use the flats to teachers and researchers in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials, teachers and researchers of the universities in the city.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said in a speech that the flats which the teachers and researchers were to move into reflected the trust and expectation of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to see the educators and scientists become standard-bearers and pace-setters in adding shine to the country as a world famous sci-tech power and highly civilized nation.
					
					 He underscored the need for the educators to bring up more talented persons who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the great Paektusan nation and thus exalt the honor of being career revolutionaries bestowed upon them by the Party.
					
					 He called upon the scientists to make positive contributions to building a thriving nation through a dynamic drive for breaking through the cutting edge.
					
					 Educators and researchers on Wednesday began moving into their new flats in Mirae Scientists Street fitted with all kinds of modern furniture and having best quality amenities. 
					
					 Officials, teachers and students congratulated the settlers.

articles.title: Loyal Members of Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through Rason City
articles.content:
Loyal Members of Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through Rason City
Rason, November 4 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of the young vanguard passed through Rason City.
					 The relay group arrived in Rajin area, Rason City on Nov. 1.
					
					 It was greeted by Jo Jong Ho, chairman of the Rason City People's Committee, officials concerned, working people of various circles and school youth and children.
					
					 The red flag was handed to the relay group of loyal members of the young vanguard in Rason City.
					
					 Members of the relay group laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Rason City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 That day they attended an oath-taking meeting of the members of the young vanguard of Rason City.
					
					 Being briefed on the historic data at the Rason Revolutionary Museum, Changphyong Revolutionary Site and Haeyang Revolutionary Site, they looked round the historic relics.
					
					 After going round the fish-processing facilities at the Rason Taehung Trade Company, they had a meeting with the participants of the 2nd National Meeting of Young Front-Rankers in Noble Traits.
					
					 At the Sahyangsan Revolutionary Battle Site they went round the place where Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk guided the plan for the final operation of the Rajin People's Armed Group and slogan-bearing trees.
					
					 They toured the temporary secret bases in Mts. Sonbong and Paekhak and historic sites in Sonbong area.
					
					 They went round dwelling houses in Paekhak-dong of Sonbong area.
					
					 During the march, they had diverse political and cultural events.

articles.title: 19th National Exhibition of Sports Science and Technology Successes Opens
articles.content:
19th National Exhibition of Sports Science and Technology Successes Opens
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The 19th national exhibition of sports science and technology successes was opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Wednesday.
					 Displayed there were more than 1 500 science and technology successes including sports apparatuses, measuring appliances, medicines, books and papers presented by the sports field, scientific and research institutions, educational organs, factories and enterprises.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned and officials in the sports field, and working people.
					
					 Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made an opening address.
					
					 The participants looked round science and technology successes on display.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Building Materials Held
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Building Materials Held
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of building materials took place here on Tuesday and Wednesday.
					 Present there were officials, teachers, researchers, field engineers and postgraduates in the field of building-materials industry including the Ministry of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, the State Academy of Sciences, Pyongyang University of Architecture and the Pyongyang Building-Materials Factory.
					
					 Its participants heard scores of papers conducive to developing science and technology in the field of building materials.
					
					 The presenters introduced the achievements and experience they gained in the course of locally producing various building materials, parts and elements, keeping the production of building-materials factories going at high rate and developing more varieties of quality building materials of world-level competitiveness.
					
					 There was a lecture on the world trend of the development of finishing building materials and scientific and technical issues arising in locally producing building materials.

articles.title: 14th National Angling Contest Held
articles.content:
14th National Angling Contest Held
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The 14th national angling contest took place on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang Wednesday. 
					 It brought together dozens of excellent anglers who are members of their association selected in Pyongyang and all provinces. 
					
					 The standing was decided according to the total number and length of fishes they caught. 
					
					 Ryang Myong Chol from Pyongyang took the first prize. 
					
					 Meanwhile, an exhibition of angling tackle inventions took place on the same day. 
					
					 Nampho City, North Hamgyong Province and Kangwon Province were highly appreciated.

articles.title: National Korean Dress Show Opens
articles.content:
National Korean Dress Show Opens
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The 13th national show of Korean dress was opened with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday.
					 On display are more than 1 000 pieces of men's and women's Korean dresses and seasonal dresses such as casuals, gala dresses, wedding dresses and children's dresses presented by technicians and skilled workers of factories and enterprises in the field of garment industry and tailor's shops, teachers, researchers and students of the educational and scientific research institutions and members of the women's union.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Jo Yong Chol, minister of Food and Consumer Goods Industries, Choe Il Ryong, minister of Light Industry, Kim Kyong Nam, minister of Commerce, and Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, who doubles as vice-chairmen of the Korean Dress Society, officials concerned, officials, scientists and technicians, workers who presented their products to the show and members of the women's union.
					
					 The participants looked round the show.
					
					 A fashion show took place at the ceremony.
					
					 The show will involve a workshop on the advantages of Korean dresses, features of their varieties, methods of tailoring and making Korean trousers and jackets and distribution of literature on garment technology.
					
					 The show will last till Nov. 6.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Leadership Method of Juche
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Leadership Method of Juche
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the powerful staff of the revolution victoriously advancing the cause of popular masses for independence and socialism by the Juche-oriented leadership method. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The WPK's leadership method is the Juche-oriented one based on the people-first principle which fully embodies the requirements of the Juche idea, Songun idea. 
					
					 The WPK has displayed its might as an experienced staff of the revolution confidently leading the cause of the popular masses for independence and socialism to the ever-victorious road for several decades. Its main factor is the scientific accuracy, truth, originality and advantages of its leadership method. 
					
					 The WPK's leadership method is the most powerful method as it helps solve all issues arising in the revolution and construction by depending on the popular masses, driving force of the revolution. 
					
					 The strength of the popular masses means the strength of ideology and might of collectivism. Ideology decides everything and inexhaustible is the strength of the awakened collective. 
					
					 The WPK has consistently maintained the principle of shaping its lines and policies by fully reflecting the requirements and will of the popular masses and implementing them by motivating them ideologically. 
					
					 The WPK's leadership method is the most revolutionary one as it gives priority to the military affairs and wins one victory after another with the Korean People's Army as its core and main force. 
					
					 The army precisely means the party, state and people. This is the unique Songun revolutionary principle reflected in the WPK's leadership method. 
					
					 The leadership ability and fighting capability of the revolutionary party are decided by the great ideology and leadership of the leader of the party and the revolution.

articles.title: Victory in Stand-off with U.S. Belongs to DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Victory in Stand-off with U.S. Belongs to DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. ruling quarters are raising a hue and cry over "provocation" and "threat" from the DPRK as regards the military parade for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), a proof of the rapid growth of the military muscle and national power of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists launch a war against the DPRK at any cost, pursuant to its scenario for invading the DPRK, the latter will take a prompt counteraction against it, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the resolute determination and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK led by the WPK to bring earlier the U.S. final ruin by countering its war of aggression with conventional force involved with Korean-style conventional war, its war of aggression with nuclear force involved with Korean-style nuclear strike warfare and its cyber warfare with Korean-style cyber warfare.
					
					 The U.S. sustained a bitter defeat in the war fought against the DPRK armed with rifles, though it was possessed of A-bombs. It is nonsensical for the U.S. to emerge a victor in the war to be ignited by it.
					
					 The situation at present is quite different from that of the past.
					
					 The DPRK emerged a full-fledged nuclear weapons state, a dramatic change that took place since 1950s. Thus, the DPRK has possessed of another treasured sword for putting a definite end to the partial era when the U.S. imperialists unilaterally threatened the DPRK with A-bombs, and for defending peace and achieving a sure victory in confrontation with them. 
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to win a final victory in the standoff with the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Abusing Humanitarianism for Espionage against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Abusing Humanitarianism for Espionage against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the U.S. whistleblower website The Intercept disclosed the fact that the U.S. Defence Department has moved to use the "Humanitarian International Service Group" (HISG) for espionage against the DPRK under the veil of Christian humanitarian cooperation group.
					 It was said that Pentagon attempted to slip transistors and other wireless information-gathering instruments into the things such as garment that the HISG sent to the DPRK from 2004 to 2012.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary that this is aimed at destabilizing the DPRK and spying on such important military secrets as information about its nuclear activities.
					
					 This doesn't conform to the humanitarian mission and goal at all and it diametrically runs counter to the international principle, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is free to abuse even humanitarianism for espionage though it is apt to talk volumes about "inviolability." This act against humanitarianism and human rights patently proves that its hostile policy towards the DPRK has gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 Not a few Americans were arrested while perpetrating espionage and other hostile acts after entering the DPRK under the guise of "charitable persons" or "tourists" in the past. 
					
					 All of them were sentenced to relevant penalties by the law of the DPRK and the U.S. suffered disgrace over each issue of their release.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that its mean and despicable espionage plans and operations can never escape the sharp watch of the relevant organs of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to immediately stop the espionage against the DPRK through the humanitarian cooperation group if it does not wish to see more Americans serve prison terms here.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A bloody gun-related crime occurred in Florida State, the U.S. to be followed by another shooting spree in the campus of Tennessee State University on Oct. 22 which left one dead and two others wounded.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says:
					
					 This ceaseless occurrence of gun-related crimes in the U.S. clearly proves its horrible human rights abuses.
					
					 Even the elementary right of people to existence is wantonly violated in the U.S., to say nothing of other human rights.
					
					 What matters is that the gun-related crimes that threw people into fear and uneasiness cannot be viewed as results of excessive acts of a few criminals.
					
					 Even the U.S. president deplores this tragic reality as he is unable to put it under control.
					
					 Interests of a handful of capitalists are placed above the right of the toiling masses to existence in the U.S. society. Broad masses of toiling people fall victim to such gun-related crimes occurring in an unbroken chain due to the criminals produced by the corrupt and ailing society.
					
					 Such country is styling itself a world "human rights judge," the greatest insult to the inviolable human rights.
					
					 The U.S. has neither qualifications nor justification to talk about human rights.
					
					 The U.S. should stop pulling up other countries over their human rights issues but mind its serious human rights abuses.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Nuclear Carrier's Portcall on Pusan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Nuclear Carrier's Portcall on Pusan
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Ronald Reagan, nuclear carrier of the 7th fleet of the U.S. navy, entered an operational base in Pusan on Oct. 30, escorted by its cruisers and destroyers.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers are describing these moves as "expansion of exchange" and "promotion of friendship" between the navies.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday observes: The entry of the carrier into the waters off south Korea is aimed at staging DPRK-targeted war exercises with the south Korean warmongers.
					
					 Those ships actually staged large-scale joint naval maneuvers with south Korean forces in waters off Pusan from Oct. 26 to 29, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the trite method of the U.S. to escalate military tension with war hardware including carriers involved before invading other countries and nations.
					
					 The entry of Ronald Reagan with dozens of fighters aboard is to pressurize the DPRK by force.
					
					 However, the south Korean warmongers allowed the entry of the aggression fleet into the operational base in Pusan under the pretext of "expansion of exchange" and "promotion of friendship," not content with the above-said saber-rattling. This is nothing but a poor burlesque to cover up their true colors as the arch criminal deteriorating the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK stands for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification but never shows mercy to the provocateurs keen to do harm to the fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 Should the south Korean military warmongers persistently collude with foreign aggressors, they will only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: U.S.-South Korea Joint Aerial Drill for Invading DPRK
articles.content:
U.S.-South Korea Joint Aerial Drill for Invading DPRK
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean military warmongers kicked off a joint aerial drill aimed to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK in Kwangju, south Korea on Nov. 2.
					 Involved in the saber-rattling which will last till Nov. 7 were the Seventh Air Force Command of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea and the Air Force Operation Command of south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Accused of Being Subservient to Power
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Accused of Being Subservient to Power
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean media and civic organizations disclosed the crimes committed by Ko Tae Yong, candidate for KBS president, on October 26. 
					 The Citizens' Solidarity for Media Reform said every schoolboy may know well that KBS Council's nomination of Ko Tae Yong as candidate for president is the "product" of Chongwadae. It expressed concern that if Ko becomes the president of KBS, it will be reduced to a tool serving the ruling forces. 
					
					 Ko is the man who stoops to any brutal means and method for personal luxury, they said. 
					
					 The Press Trade Union also in a statement said that Ko is not qualified for the post as he has barred KBS from ensuring fair reporting.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Subservience to Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Subservience to Japan
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea staged actions against the authorities' subservience to Japan in Seoul on Nov. 2, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The People's Action for Peace against War and other civic and public organizations held a joint press conference around Chongwadae.
					
					 The organizations condemned the chief executive for pushing forward talks with the Japanese prime minister though she failed to seek solution to the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Meanwhile, organizations for national movement, organizations for settling the issue of the past history and other organizations held a press conference outside the "government" building.
					
					 They voiced opposition to the talks on behalf of the nation as they do not settle the basic issues such as the past crimes committed by Japan.

articles.title: Protest against "State-compiled" History Textbooks Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against "State-compiled" History Textbooks Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- People of various circles in North Jolla Province have carried on a dynamic action in protest against the authorities' moves for introducing "state-compiled" history textbooks, according to the south Korean website News 1.
					 The North Jolla Provincial Civic and Public Organization against "State-compiled" History Textbooks made up of more than twenty civic and public organizations such as the North Jolla Provincial branch of the Institute for National Studies held a press conference at the building of the Provincial Educational Office on Oct. 29.
					
					 Speakers termed the moves to introduce the "state-compiled" history textbooks a sinister ploy to twist the essence of education and enslave the people as they are a history coup of totalitarians swimming against the trend of the times.
					
					 They demanded the chief executive immediately halt her moves for distorting history and embellishing the pro-Japanese dictatorship.
					
					 Members of the Association of History Teachers of North Jolla Province and those of the North Jolla Provincial History Society and many teachers declared opposition to the above-said textbooks and boycotting of writing those textbooks on October 21 and 26.
					
					 The Government Employees Trade Union and persons of culture and arts held press conferences on October 27 and 28 each in protest against the moves of the regime.

articles.title: Parents of S. Korean Students Protest against Authorities' Moves to Rewrite History
articles.content:
Parents of S. Korean Students Protest against Authorities' Moves to Rewrite History
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Oh My News said parents of students in Ryangsan area of South Kyongsang Province on October 28 sent a joint declaration signed by 1 459 persons to the Ministry of Education in protest against the authorities' moves to tamper with history. 
					 In this regard the parents held a press conference in the City Office building that day. 
					
					 Speakers said they signed the declaration, unable to see the foundation of education shaking owing to the moves to introduce "state- compiled" history textbooks. 
					
					 On October 27 parents of students had the text of the joint declaration together with ads critical of those textbooks carried on a newspaper.

articles.title: Japan Prosecution Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Chongryon Assailed
articles.content:
Japan Prosecution Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Chongryon Assailed
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Japanese prosecution authorities held a trial of the president of the Korean Goods Sales Company and others at the Kyoto district court on Oct. 27 in a desperate bid to bring charges against them, according to Choson Sinbo, organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The prosecution authorities made far-fetched assertions that the company might have known the fact that Songi mushroom which the DPRK sold to Chinese was exported to Japan and the Tongbang Company exported Songi mushroom to Japan through Chinese which means the two companies have had indirect relations and conspired with each other.
					
					 In the end, the prosecution took such fascist action as sentencing the Company president and others to two years in prison.
					
					 The defence counsel revealed the injustice of the ruling, refuting the falsity of the charges made by the prosecution.
					
					 Watching the trial, officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan protested the action taken by the court.
					
					 The fascist action of the Japanese prosecution authorities is a revelation of the sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to incite anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon sentiment by branding Chongryon as a criminal organization.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Canadian Political Party
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Canadian Political Party
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist) carried an article supporting the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on the paper TML Weekly on October 24.
					 The article noted:
					
					 October 10, 2015 marked the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK.
					
					 On the occasion there took place a military parade and public procession of Pyongyang citizens for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK with splendor at Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang, demonstrating the united might of the WPK and the Korean people before the world.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK after defeating the Japanese aggressors.
					
					 Under his leadership the newly founded WPK beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressors in the brutal war provoked by the U.S.
					
					 In the postwar period the WPK built a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence by organizing and mobilizing the people despite the vicious and ceaseless military threat and economic sanctions of the U.S.
					
					 The WPK has consistently adhered to the stand of opposing the aggression and nuclear threat of the U.S. and its allies and called for the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and worked hard to achieve national reunification, regarding it as its historic task.
					
					 The Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist) pays tribute to the great achievements made by the WPK in its struggle for protecting the Korean nation and achieving peace.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed by Magazine of Asia-Pacific Regional Office of WFTU
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed by Magazine of Asia-Pacific Regional Office of WFTU
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The October issue of Flash, the magazine of the Asia-Pacific Regional Office of the World Federation of Trade Unions (WFTU), carried an article on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The WPK, which led the Korean revolution along the road of victory and glory, has recorded its glorious 70 year-long history, the magazine said, and went on:
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union on Oct. 17, 1926 which became the roots of the WPK.
					
					 At the Kalun Meeting the President advanced the original policy of forming basic level party organizations, to begin with, and founding the party by way of steadily expanding them. Pursuant to it, the organizational and ideological foundation for party founding was laid during the bloody anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 On the basis of this, he founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945 without delay after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 For the past seven decades since its founding the WPK has powerfully demonstrated its dignity and might as the experienced and tested revolutionary party trained in struggle and the invincible party which enjoys absolute support and trust of the people.
					
					 The WPK has grown strong to be the eternal party of the leader and the mother party which formed a harmonious whole with the people thanks to respected Comrade Kim Jong Un who is glorifying Comrade Kim Il Sung's and Comrade Kim Jong Il's undying idea of party building and their feats.

articles.title: DPRK's Reality Introduced by Czech Newspaper
articles.content:
DPRK's Reality Introduced by Czech Newspaper
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Oct. 24th issue of the Czech newspaper Proscejobska Pravda carried an article titled "Everything is quite contrary to reality. Truth about the DPRK as seen in photos" illustrated with photos of supreme leader Kim Jong Un inspecting units of the Korean People's Army and giving field guidance to various fields of the national economy and other photos.
					 The paper carried hundreds of photos showing the successes registered by the Korean people such as Mirae Scientists Street and those dealing with politics, economy, military, culture, history and natural scenery.
					
					 It edited the following explanation:
					
					 The U.S. wicked propaganda about the "miserable reality" of the DPRK and a litany of "evidence" faked up by bribed "witnesses" and traitors have now become things of the past.
					
					 In the past we were taken in by the false propaganda about the DPRK.
					
					 Such false propaganda has been misused as levers of the U.S. and its followers for implementing their aggressive and imperialist policy for dominating the world, plundering other countries' economy and enslaving them.
					
					 Korea was divided by foreign forces against its people's will and they underwent the unspeakable pain and disasters due to the U.S. massacres more horrible than what Nazis committed.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are busy pursuing the policy of destructive blockade against the DPRK and conducting false propaganda but the latter is standing firm against them through its actions and with the muscle of the army.
					
					 The photos dealing with the reality of the DPRK will greatly shock those who believed in the false propaganda about it.

articles.title: Ulterior Aim Sought by U.S. in Objecting to Conclusion of Peace Treaty Disclosed by Russian Expert
articles.content:
Ulterior Aim Sought by U.S. in Objecting to Conclusion of Peace Treaty Disclosed by Russian Expert
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Alexander Zhebin, director of the Center for the Study of Korean Affairs under the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Science, disclosed the ulterior aim sought by the U.S. in objecting to the conclusion of a peace treaty, according to the Russian Sputnik Broadcasting Service on Oct. 30.
					 Recollecting that at the recent UN General Assembly, the DPRK foreign minister called on the U.S. to replace the 1953 Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) by a peace treaty, he said:
					
					 The party to the AA at that time was not south Korea but the U.S.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is refusing to conclude the treaty with the DPRK. The former is not willing to own its moral and material responsibilities for the Korean War.
					
					 It claims that it did not participate in the war at the level of a state.
					
					 But a U.S. army general signed the AA as a representative of the UN Command.
					
					 The U.S. denied the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty with it.
					
					 One of the reasons it claims is that the DPRK is not honoring its international commitment as evidenced by its refusal to stop producing nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. does not work for settling the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula under various pretexts.
					
					 The reason is that the U.S. has to justify the building of its missile shield under the pretext of the DPRK's threat in East Asia.
					
					 It is clear that its moves for building the missile shield in the Asia-Pacific region target Russia and China, among other things.
					
					 It is the contention of the U.S. that it can justify its forces' presence in south Korea only when the DPRK is labeled "evil" in this region.

articles.title: Iniciada mudanza a viviendas en avenida de cientificos Mirae
articles.content:
Iniciada mudanza a viviendas en avenida de cientificos Mirae
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 la ceremonia de entrega de certificado de uso de viviendas a los  profesores e investigadores de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					En la ocasion participaron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok; el secretario jefe del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Gil; el presidente del Comite de Educacion Kim Sung Du; el presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Cha Hui Rim, asi como los funcionarios, profesores e investigadores de las universidades en esta capital.
					
					Choe Thae Bok hizo uso de la palabra.
					
					El orador dijo que las nuevas viviendas reflejan la gran confianza y expectativa del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de que los educadores e investigadores sean abanderados y vanguardias en glorificar nuestro pais como potencia cientifico-tecnica y el pais civilizado de talla mundial.
					
					Llamo a los educadores a formar muchas mas a las personas talentosas que se encarguen del futuro de la potencia del monte Paektu y asi hacer brillar el honor de revolucionarios profesionales dispensado por el Partido.
					
					Subrayo que los cientificos deben contribuir a la construccion de la patria prospera desplegando con dinamismo una campana para alcanzar los niveles sofisticados.
					
					El dia 4, se inicio la mudanza a nuevas viviendas en la Avenida de Cientificos Mirae.
					
					Los funcionarios, profesores y estudiantes de las universidades felicitaron a los duenos de viviendas provistas de los muebles modernos.

articles.title: Presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de rama de materiales de construccion
articles.content:
Presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de rama de materiales de construccion
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 3 y 4 la presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de la rama de materiales de construccion. 
					Alli participaron los funcionarios, profesores, investigadores, ingenieros y cursantes de instituto doctoral del Ministerio de Construccion e Industria de Materiales de Construccion, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, la Fabrica de Materiales de Construccion de Pyongyang y otras unidades de la industria de materiales de construccion.
					
					En la ocasion se presentaron decenas de disertaciones que se contribuiran al desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas de la rama. 
					
					Los exponentes dieron a conocer sus exitos y experiencias alcanzados en nacionalizar los materiales, elementos prefabricados y accesorios necesarios a la construccion, normalizar la produccion en las fabricas de materiales de construccion y estudiar y desarrollar mucho mas materiales competitivas. 
					
					Se impartio una leccion sobre la tendencia de desarrollo de materiales de acabado y sobre los problemas cientifico-tecnicos para la nacionalizacion de los materiales de construccion.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia entrada de portaaviones Ronald Reagan en Pusan
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia entrada de portaaviones Ronald Reagan en Pusan
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El 30 de octubre, el portaaviones nuclear Ronald Reagan perteneciente a la septima flota de la marina norteamericana entro en una base  operacional de Pusan, acompanando con los cruceros y destructores de las fuerzas navales de Estados Unidos
					os belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos lo califican de la "ampliacion del intercambio" y el "fomento de la amistad" entre las fuerzas navales de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Este portaaviones se aparecio en las aguas surcoreanas para desarrollar junto con los belicistas surcoreanos los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					En realidad, Ronald Reagan y otros navios de las tropas agresoras de EE.UU. realizaron del 26 al 29 de octubre en el mar frente a Pusan la maniobra de movilidad maritima combinada junto con los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					EE.UU. agrava siempre la tension militar movilizando el portaaviones y otros equipos belicos antes de agredir a otro pais y otra nacion. Esto es el metodo rutinario de ese pais americano.
					
					La presencia de este portaaviones en el mar surcoreano tiene objeto de presionar militarmente a la RPDC.
					
					A pesar de esto, los belicistas surcoreanos hablan de la "ampliacion del intercambio" y el "fomento de la amistad", lo que no pasa de ser una farsa para encubrir su naturaleza de fautor del empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Aunque deseamos la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la paz y la reunificacion, no concedemos caridad a los provocadores que maniobran para danar a la misma nacion en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Si los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana siguen cooperando con las fuerzas extranjeras agresivas, anticiparan solo su autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia EE.UU. que abusa de humanitarismo en espionaje anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia EE.UU. que abusa de humanitarismo en espionaje anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el sitio web estadounidense especializado en revelacion The Intercept revelo el hecho de que el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos ha venido trabajando para espionar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea utilizando el "Grupo de Servicio Humanitario Internacional" (HISG) con mascara de la entidad cristiana de cooperacion humanitaria.
					Desde 2004 hasta 2012, el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. intento a enviar a la RPDC los mini-radios, los aparatos radiofonicos de espionaje y otros metiendolos en los vestidos y otras materias.
					
					Estas maniobras parten de un objeto de descomponer el interior de la RPDC y espiar los importantes secretos militares inclusive los datos relacionados con las actividades nucleares.
					
					Asi revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 4 y continua:
					
					Esto no conviene absolutamente a la mision y al objeto del humanitarismo y contraviene a los principios internacionales.
					
					Estas maniobras antihumanitarias y anti-DDHH de EE.UU., que usa en el espionaje hasta el humanitarismo de que hablaba de su "caracter sagrado", demuestran claramente que la politica hostil a la RPDC pasa el limite.
					
					En el pasado fueron revelados muchos estadounidenses que entraron con la mascara del "filantropo" o "turista" en la RPDC y perpetraron el espionaje y los actos hostiles.
					
					Todos ellos fueron detenidos y castigados segun las leyes de la RPDC y EE.UU. se vio obligado a sufrir verguenzas para liberarlos de la presion coreana. 
					
					EE.UU. debe saber claramente que sus planes y operaciones astutos de espionaje no pueden evitarse la vista de los organos competentes de la RPDC.
					
					Y debe poner inmediato fin a sus espionajes que se perpetran a traves de las entidades de cooperacion humanitaria si no quiere meter mas estadounidenses en la carcel.
